lech-lecha.context: God's call to Abraham to leave his homeland
lech-lecha.english: Go forth from your native land and from your father's house

father-of-nations.english: You shall be the father of a multitude of nations

count-the-stars.context: God shows Abraham the night sky
count-the-stars.hebrew: הַבֶּט־נָא הַשָּׁמַיְמָה וּסְפֹר הַכּוֹכָבִים... כֹּה יִהְיֶה זַרְעֶךָ
count-the-stars.english: Look toward heaven and count the stars... So shall your offspring be

hineni.context: Abraham's response when God calls him

counted-as-righteousness.english: And he put his trust in God, who reckoned it to his merit

god-will-provide.context: Abraham's answer to Isaac on Mount Moriah
god-will-provide.mood: faith under trial, trust in providence

blessing-to-nations.context: The blessing that flows through Abraham
blessing-to-nations.english: All the families of the earth shall bless themselves by you
